inversionEmpresarial.title: Business Investment - CHE Free World
inversionEmpresarial.description: Investment projects and entrepreneurship for economic development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Facilitate access to investment capital for entrepreneurs and companies seeking to expand their operations or develop new innovative projects.

process.title: Application Process
process.content: Interested parties can submit their investment proposals through our online portal, where they will be evaluated by our team of experts.
